title: Reel Pizza Cinerama
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A two screen movie theater that serves pizza, nachos, and typical theater fair. Has vegan cheese for the pizza and nachos, with tofu as a topping choice, and gluten free crust option. Nutritional yeast and olive oil is available in the theaters to top the popcorn. Uses some local, organic produce.
